## Name

passwd

## Synopsis

```sh
$ passwd [--delete] [--lock] [--unlock] [username]
```

## Description

Modify an account password.

## Options

-   `-d`, `--delete`: Delete password
-   `-l`, `--lock`: Lock password
-   `-u`, `--unlock`: Unlock password

## Arguments

-   `username`: Username
